ram-vs-hard-disk_key1: Inn questions ke baarein mei thoda socho
ram-vs-hard-disk_key2: Variables kaha store hota hai - RAM* mei ya Hard Disk mei?
ram-vs-hard-disk_key3: Database kaha store ho raha hai, hamare code mei? Database mei ya RAM mei?
ram-vs-hard-disk_key4:
Hint:
Database file mei store ho raha hai. Files kaha store hoti hai?
ram-vs-hard-disk_key5: Toh hum jo get aur set jaise functions call kar rahe hai, woh kis database par ho rahe hai - jo hard disk par hai, ya jo memory mei loaded hai?
ram-vs-hard-disk_key6: RAM fast hoti hai ya Hard Disk?
ram-vs-hard-disk_key7: Aapke laptop mei kitni RAM hai, kitni Hard Disk?
ram-vs-hard-disk_key8: Agar RAM, Hard Disk se faster hoti hai, toh hum hard disk kyu rakhte hai, hum sirf badi RAM se hi laptop kyu nahi bana sakte?
ram-vs-hard-disk_key9: Persistent shabd ka kya matlab hota hai?
ram-vs-hard-disk_key11: Hard Disk persistent hoti hai kya?
ram-vs-hard-disk_key12: Aap apne database ko persistent jagah par save karna chahoge, ya non-persistent jagah par?
